text: Polɨn akar kam en dagɨar ingangarimɨn ziar aghuim gasɨghasigham. Bizir kamra puvatɨ, uaghan gumazamizibar nɨghnɨzimɨn, Artemisɨn dɨpenim pura bizir kɨnim gavagham. Eghtɨ Artemis uabɨ, me Esian Provins ko nguazir kam bar moghɨra ua godɨn mɨn an ganan kogham. An marvir guam pura bizir kɨnim gavagham!”
